section_title:
21k04 - Incidental activities by employees of a restaurant, hotel, or
motel.
text:
(a)   Gift items. souvenirs, and tobacco products. Employees employed by
an establishment which is a hotel, motel, or restaurant in activities connected
with the incidental sale of such items as gifts, souvenirs, and tobacco
products will be considered as within the scope of the business and hence
subject to the exemption.
html:
(a)   Gift items. souvenirs, and tobacco products.

 

Employees employed by an establishment which is a hotel, motel, or restaurant in activities connected with the incidental sale of such items as gifts, souvenirs, and tobacco products will be considered as within the scope of the business and hence subject to the exemption.
